name: io.github.prefrontal-systems/cortexgraph
description: Temporal memory for AI with decay and reinforcement. Two-layer storage (JSONL + Markdown).

environmentVariables.description: Storage path for short-term memory JSONL files
environmentVariables.name: CORTEXGRAPH_STORAGE_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Path to Obsidian vault for long-term memory
environmentVariables.name: LTM_VAULT_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Decay model: power_law (default), exponential, or two_component
environmentVariables.name: CORTEXGRAPH_DECAY_MODEL

environmentVariables.description: Half-life in days for power-law decay model
environmentVariables.name: CORTEXGRAPH_PL_HALFLIFE_DAYS
